roleset.name: injured, hindered via bodily injury

roles.note: If an additional instrument arg is needed, please add one in accordance with the verb frame.

example.name: both args
example.text: Zhang Beiqi Was Maimed from Being Tortured on the "Stretching Bed" in Jilin Prison.
example.arg: from Being Tortured on the "Stretching Bed"

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, maim-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls destroy-44.
